verses.verse: For the <S%H4256>courses<s%> of the <S%H7778>doorkeepers<s%>: of the <S%H7145>Korahites<s%>, <S%H4920>Meshelemiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6981>Kore<s%>, of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>.

And <S%H4920>Meshelemiah<s%> had <S%H1121>sons<s%>: <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, <S%H3043>Jediael<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>, <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%>, <S%H3496>Jathniel<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth<s%>,
Elam <S%H5867><s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%>, <S%H3076>Jehohanan<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%>, <S%H454>Eliehoenai<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%>.

And <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> had <S%H1121>sons<s%>: <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, <S%H3075>Jehozabad<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>, <S%H3098>Joah<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%>, and <S%H7940>Sacar<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth<s%>, and <S%H5417>Nethanel<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%>,
Ammiel <S%H5988><s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%>, <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%>, <S%H6469>Peullethai<s%> the <S%H8066>eighth<s%>; for <S%H430>God<s%> blessed <S%H1288>him<s%>.

Also unto <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> were <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3205>born<s%>, that <S%H4474>ruled<s%> over the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%>; for they were mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>: <S%H6273>Othni<s%>, and <S%H7501>Rephael<s%>, and <S%H5744>Obed<s%>, <S%H443>Elzabad<s%>, whose <S%H251>brethren<s%> were <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1121>men<s%>, <S%H453>Elihu<s%>, and <S%H5565>Semachiah<s%>.

All these were of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%>: they and their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> in <S%H3581>strength<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%>; <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%>.
And <S%H4920>Meshelemiah<s%> had <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1121>men<s%>, <S%H8083>eighteen<s%>.

Also <S%H2621>Hosah<s%>, of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, had <S%H1121>sons<s%>: <S%H8113>Shimri<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%>, (for though he was not the <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, yet his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> him <S%H7218>chief<s%>),

Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>, <S%H2882>Tebaliah<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%>, <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth<s%>: all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H251>brethren<s%> of <S%H2621>Hosah<s%> were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%>.

Of these were the <S%H4256>courses<s%> of the <S%H7778>doorkeepers<s%>, even of the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H1397>men<s%>, having <S%H4931>offices<s%> <S%H5980>like<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And they <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%>, as well the <S%H6996>small<s%> as the <S%H1419>great<s%>, according to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>, for every <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

And the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> to <S%H8018>Shelemiah<s%>. Then for <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, a <S%H7922>discreet<s%> <S%H3289>counsellor<s%>, they <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%>; and his <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>.
To <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%>; and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H624>the<s%> <S%H1004>store-house<s%>.

To <S%H8206>Shuppim<s%> and <S%H2621>Hosah<s%> <S%H4628>westward<s%>, by the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H7996>Shallecheth<s%>, at the <S%H4546>causeway<s%> that goeth <S%H5927>up<s%>, <S%H4929>watch<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> <S%H4929>watch<s%>.

Eastward <S%H4217><s%> were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, <S%H6828>northward<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5045>southward<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%>, and for the <S%H624>store-house<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%>.
For <S%H6503>Parbar<s%> <S%H4628>westward<s%>, <S%H702>four<s%> at the <S%H4546>causeway<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> at <S%H6503>Parbar<s%>.
These were the <S%H4256>courses<s%> of the <S%H7778>doorkeepers<s%>; of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H7145>Korahites<s%>, and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>.

And of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> was over the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and over the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the dedicated <S%H6944>things<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3936>Ladan<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> belonging to <S%H3936>Ladan<s%>, the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses belonging to <S%H3936>Ladan<s%> the <S%H1649>Gershonite<s%>: <S%H3172>Jehieli<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3172>Jehieli<s%>: <S%H2241>Zetham<s%>, and <S%H3100>Joel<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, over the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Of the <S%H6020>Amramites<s%>, of the <S%H3325>Izharites<s%>, of the <S%H2276>Hebronites<s%>, of the <S%H5817>Uzzielites<s%>:
and <S%H7619>Shebuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, was <S%H5057>ruler<s%> over the <S%H214>treasures<s%>.

And his <S%H251>brethren<s%>: of <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> came <S%H7345>Rehabiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H3470>Jeshaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H3141>Joram<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H2147>Zichri<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H8019>Shelomoth<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

This <S%H8013>Shelomoth<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> were over all the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the dedicated <S%H6944>things<s%>, which <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H8269>houses<s%>, the captains over <S%H505>thousands<s%> and <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%>, had <S%H6942>dedicated<s%>.
Out of the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> won in <S%H4421>battles<s%> did they <S%H6942>dedicate<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And all that <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> the <S%H7200>seer<s%>, and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%>, and <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner<s%>, and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%>, had <S%H6942>dedicated<s%>, whosoever had <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> <S%H3027>anything<s%>, it was under the hand of <S%H8019>Shelomoth<s%>, and of his <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

Of the <S%H3325>Izharites<s%>, <S%H3663>Chenaniah<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were for the <S%H2435>outward<s%> <S%H4399>business<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, for <S%H7860>officers<s%> and <S%H8199>judges<s%>.

Of the <S%H2276>Hebronites<s%>, <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H1121>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, had the <S%H6486>oversight<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4628>westward<s%>, for all the <S%H4399>business<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

Of the <S%H2276>Hebronites<s%> was <S%H3404>Jerijah<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%>, even of the <S%H2276>Hebronites<s%>, according to their <S%H8435>generations<s%> by <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H705>houses<s%>. In the fortieth <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> they were <S%H1875>sought<s%> <S%H4672>for<s%>, and there were found among them mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%> at <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

And his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H1121>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, were two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H4428>houses<s%>, whom king <S%H1732>David<s%> made <S%H6485>overseers<s%> over the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of the <S%H4520>Manassites<s%>, for every <S%H1697>matter<s%> pertaining to <S%H430>God<s%>, and for the <S%H1697>affairs<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
